subtitle: Deep fried vegetable fritters. Use your preferred vegetable - or fruit! Serve with a dip made from chilli sauce mixed into tomato ketchup.

method.text: Sift the flour, salt and chilli powder into a bowl. Add enough water to make a thick coating batter. Beat well until smooth. Leave to stand for 30 min.
Stir the chilli, coriander and seasoning and butter into the batter.
Heat the oil in a large saucepan until it reaches 180°C.

Drop the onin rings into the batter to coat well. Deep fry in 2 batches for 1-2 min each batch or until crisp and golden. Remove with a metal slotted spoon. Drain thoroughly on kitchen paper. Keep warm while cooking the remainder.
Drop the aubergine and courgette slices into the batter, as above. Cook in two batches for 2-3 min each batch, until crisp and golden. Remove and drain.
